Or is it something else? To note, I have an 8 page bonus story for Yamitsuki where as the one in this scan is for Ayataka.

They aren't sharing her, Glasses and the girl secretly like each other and she started masturbating to his smell/towel.  Blonde caught her, blackmailed her, and now they're keeping it a secret from Glasses.  Apparently they're all "best friends".  Standard netorare story.
in the first Story , I am just wondering why  the two men are sharing a woman, but I thought to myself some men are fine with being eskimo brothers.
